display_long_description:
In a world filled with strange machines, battle flying swarms (a first in VR) and if you survive long enough, get obliterated by the Mother Of Swarm.                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                           
[media]

Flesh & Bone is a brutal, 90s stylization of the survival arena genre (this means zero tutorial and no hand holding) where you chose your strategy: 
- Hand of bone for necro magic and hijacking the brain of your enemy
[media]
- Hand of flesh for epic melee combat and turret defense technology
[media]
- Or combine both.

[media]

Upgrade from being a victim to a leaping GOD OF DEAH, unleashing destruction high up above the battlefield, run faster than the enemy and impose decisive ...pacification.
[media]

# ITERATIVE RELEASE
This first release has one very hard level. Every 10,000 new players there will be a new update and a price increase. 

[media]

Early buyers get to enjoy all the new levels at no extra charge.

[media]

Do you want a new world? New tech? New enemies? A different art style? You vote: https://discord.gg/h543pKKyYf

[media]


Features:
- 3x vastly different gameplay strategies
- Giant Creatures
- Ultra dynamic movement where you can leap high above  the enemy
- Swarms and crowds of hundreds of enemies on-screen
- Gem and crystal upgrades
- Unlock permanent abilities
- ZERO TUTORIAL OR OPTIONS - you must be tough to play this game

[media]
